channel.title: Comments on: Ntwadumela, He Who Greets with Fire

item.title: By: Joe Daniel
item.dc:creator: Joe Daniel
item.description: Sorry to read about lion being shot by trophy hunters. May the hunters daughters backside never see daylight again until death!!!
item.content:encoded: Sorry to read about lion being shot by trophy hunters. May the hunters daughters backside never see daylight again until death!!!

item.title: By: Tom
item.dc:creator: Tom
item.description: Etwi was the baddest ass I ever saw,man or beast.He lived to fk you up.He was one no caring bad ass whis eyes told his story.I loved that animal.
item.content:encoded: Etwi was the baddest ass I ever saw,man or beast.He lived to fk you up.He was one no caring bad ass whis eyes told his story.I loved that animal.

item.title: By: Michelle Harris
item.dc:creator: Michelle Harris
item.description: I watched this series when I was a young woman with my dad. I never forgot it and told my husband and we were lucky to see the documentary again. My husband couldn't believe it. I was so inspired by it I added the scene to my fanfiction and changed the lion's name (just in case) lol: https://www.fanfiction.net/s/83626/5/Delectable-Candy
item.content:encoded: I watched this series when I was a young woman with my dad. I never forgot it and told my husband and we were lucky to see the documentary again. My husband couldn’t believe it. I was so inspired by it I added the scene to my fanfiction and changed the lion’s name (just in case) lol: https://www.fanfiction.net/s/83626/5/Delectable-Candy

item.title: By: Tony
item.dc:creator: Tony
item.description: Thats a lion that gives NO fucks at all....He don't play!
item.content:encoded: Thats a lion that gives NO fucks at all….He don’t play!

item.title: By: DeathEyes
item.dc:creator: DeathEyes
item.description: this is my favorite lion ever since i was born in 1996 he was the first animal i saw and i have been memorized by with since i was little. he has been the one who has inspired me to become a wilflife vetrinarian ever since i was able to talk.
item.content:encoded: this is my favorite lion ever since i was born in 1996 he was the first animal i saw and i have been memorized by with since i was little. he has been the one who has inspired me to become a wilflife vetrinarian ever since i was able to talk.

item.title: By: jay soto
item.dc:creator: jay soto
item.description: i hapen to watch ntwadumeila along with other animal clips.next i know hes my favorite in my u-tube account.every time im checking e-mails i change screens to check ntwa.and for some reason im able to do my tasks much faster.for some weird reason ntwa is a big inpiration.go figure.ooops i have to go to get my daily dose of ntwadomela
